Articles.Content: I don't know why but in the mac version of 1.0.5 textures can glitch out all over the screen and in the tracking station, there is always 1 glitched texture about 3 in wide running down on the left side of the screen that will change in color each time. Any ideas and Squad plz fix!

This is a support issue. Please make a new thread in the appropriate area following the guidelines for reporting issues:

[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/76-Support-%28unmodded-installs%29"]Unmodded Support[/URL] - [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide"]Stock Support and Bug Reporting Guide[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/77-Support-%28modded-installs%29"]Modded Support[/URL] - [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29"]How to get support[/URL]

Closing this one.
